notification.contentToBeAnonymized: Nata content 7 days cikin anonymized ngalaba for
notification.communityContentToBeAnonymized: All nata content in this community 7 days cikin anonymized da archived ngalaba, after that you will not be able to delete it or change it. See nata content below.
notification.groupContentToBeAnonymized: All nata content in this group 7 days cikin anonymized da archived ngalaba, after that you will not be able to delete it or change it. See nata content below.

email.possibleFraudFooter: Danna kan mahadar al'umma da ke ƙasa, shiga a matsayin admin kuma zaɓi Gudanar da Zamba daga menu.
email.possibleFraudSubHeader: Yawan ayyukan da za su yiwu na zamba tare da kiyasin damar zamba na 75%
email.possibleFraudInformation: Tsarinmu na atomatik ya gano yiwuwar aikin zamba. Za ka iya duba sosai ta hanyar dubawa ta admin na Al'umma. Wasu daga wannan aikin na iya samun dalilai marasa zamba don haka ka yi taka tsantsan wajen bincike kafin ka share abun ciki.
email.automaticToxicityDetection: An yi alama ta atomatik ga wannan abun ciki a matsayin mai guba ta amfani da algorithms na AI da ke kiyasin gubar abun ciki. Za ka iya share abun cikin idan akwai buƙata.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionVision: Wani algorithm na AI ta atomatik ya yi alama ga hotunan gani da ke da alaƙa da wannan abun ciki. Wannan algorithm yana duba hotuna don yiwuwar hotunan manya, tashin hankali, likitanci, da hotunan da ke da sha'awa. Za ka iya share abun cikin idan akwai buƙata.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionDisclaimer: Wani lokaci AI algorithm na lissafin maki mara daidai, a wannan yanayin kada ku damu, ba ku buƙatar ɗaukar wani mataki ba kuma za ku iya watsi da wannan imel.
email.automaticToxicityEnglishText: Rubutun Turanci da aka yi amfani da shi don maki
email.newPointedAddedToThisIdea: An kara sabon maki zuwa wannan ra'ayin
email.newPointedAddedToIdea: An kara sabon maki zuwa ga ra'ayinka
email.hasBeenMarkedDown: an alama shi da ba shi da amfani
email.writtenByUser: Rubutawa ta mai amfani da suna
email.youCanViewItHere: Za ka iya duba shi anan
email.postReport: An rahoto ra'ayi don keta sharuɗɗan
email.pointReport: Dumfarar an kai rahoto saboda keta sharuddan
email.user_invite_1: An gayyata ka ka shiga cikin...
email.user_invite_2: Danna kan mahadar ko manna ta cikin mashigar adireshin bincike don karɓar gayyata
email.pointUnhelpfulSelf: Alama da aka alakanta da mara amfani ga nǝgǝm nǝgǝm

email.reset_password_1: Ga mahada don canza kalmar sirrinka.
email.reset_password_2: Wǝgǝ ba a kǝyǝ, kaalǝm wǝzer ba.
email.reset_password_3: A tǝmǝ password dǝm ba zanǝ gana ka tǝmǝ link dǝbove ka kǝyǝwa wǝzer sǝy.
